feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:17 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15.
